title: skillap变量翻译
author: O0000000000000O
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content:
来自没玩过的人的翻译：
%skillapi_attribute_points%属性点
%skillapi_mana%魔力
%skillapi_max_mana%最大魔力
%skillapi_skill_level_<skillName>%技能等级 <技能名>
%skillapi_skill_points_<skillName>%技能点 <技能名>
%skillapi_skill_cost_<skillName>%技能消耗 <技能名>
%skillapi_skill_levelreq_<skillName>%技能等级需求 <技能名>
%skillapi_skill_is_maxed_<skillName>%技能是否满级 <技能名>
%skillapi_skill_message_<skillName>%技能消息 <技能名>
%skillapi_skill_type_<skillName>%技能类型 <技能名>
%skillapi_skill_req_<skillName>%技能需求 <技能名>
The following placeholders are the same as above but instead of specifying the skillName, you can specify a number from 1- <amount of skills a player has> which will show the information related to the players 1st, 2nd, 3rd skill and so on...
%skillapi_player_skill_points_<#>%玩家技能点
%skillapi_player_skill_level_<#>%玩家技能等级
%skillapi_player_skill_levelreq_<#>%玩家技能需求
%skillapi_player_skill_name_<#>%玩家技能名
%skillapi_player_skill_message_<#>%玩家技能消息
%skillapi_player_skill_req_<#>%玩家技能需求
%skillapi_player_skill_type_<#>%玩家技能类型
%skillapi_player_skill_can_autolevel_<#>%玩家技能是否能自动升级
%skillapi_player_skill_can_cast_<#>%玩家技能是否能投掷
